item.title: On: This Is Just To Say
item.description: I have eaten the plums that were in the icebox and which you were probably saving for breakfast Forgive me they were delicious so sweet and so cold William Carlos Williams A memory of a pleasant day, and remembrance that it is better to ask for forgiveness than it is to ask for permission. Daring is refreshing, when tinted with humility.
